title: Creating a reading list of articles on computational modeling of prosody involves selecting key papers that cover various aspects of the field, including theoretical foundations, methodologies, and applications. Here is a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that you might find useful
- A foundational paper discussing the integration of prosody in speech recognition systems
**"Automatic Prosody Labeling with Conditional Random Fields and Deep Belief Networks"** by Yang Liu
- Explores the use of machine learning techniques for prosody labeling
**"Prosodic Features and Prosodic Structure: The Phonology of Suprasegmentals"** by Anthony Fox
- Provides a comprehensive overview of prosodic features and their phonological representation
**"The Role of Prosody in Disambiguating Syntactic Ambiguities"** by Janet Dean Fodor
- Discusses how prosody can be used to resolve syntactic ambiguities in spoken language
**"Prosody-Based Automatic Segmentation of Speech into Sentences and Topics"**
- Investigates the use of prosodic cues for segmenting speech
**"Modeling Prosody in Speech Synthesis"** by Paul Taylor
- A detailed examination of prosody modeling techniques in text-to-speech systems
**"Prosody and Emotion in Speech: The Role of the Fundamental Frequency"** by Klaus R
- Analyzes the relationship between prosody and emotional expression in speech
**"The Use of Prosody in Automatic Speech Understanding: A Review"** by Elizabeth Shriberg and Andreas Stolcke
- Reviews the application of prosodic information in speech understanding systems
**"Prosodic Modeling in Speech Synthesis"** by Yoshinori Sagisaka
- Discusses various approaches to incorporating prosody in speech synthesis
- Explores the interaction between prosody and pragmatic aspects of language
**"Automatic Detection of Prosodic Events Using Acoustic and Lexical Features"** by Yang Liu and Elizabeth Shriberg
- Focuses on the automatic detection of prosodic events using machine learning
- Examines the role of prosodic features in speaker recognition systems
- Investigates the relationship between prosody and discourse structure
**"Prosodic Features for Automatic Text Summarization"** by Ani Nenkova, Rebecca Passonneau
- Discusses the use of prosodic features in text summarization
**"Prosody and Syntax in Speech Processing"** by Janet Pierrehumbert and Mary Beckman
- A classic work on the interaction between prosody and syntax in speech processing
**"Prosody and Information Structure"** by Caroline FÃ©ry and Shinichiro Ishihara
- Explores the role of prosody in conveying information structure

note: - Discusses the impact of prosody on language processing.

title: **"Prosody and Speech Synthesis: Challenges and Opportunities"** by Alan W
- Reviews challenges and opportunities in prosody modeling for speech synthesis
- Examines the role of prosody in speech perception
- Investigates the role of prosody in language acquisition
These articles cover a range of topics related to computational modeling of prosody, providing a solid foundation for understanding the field
